Package controller

Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
controller.AppManager
public class AppManager extends Object
The brain of everything, loads toys.txt into an arraylist, launches application and menus.
Author:
Max, Matt

  • Constructor Details

    • AppManager

      public AppManager()
      Initializes the AppManager constructor, creates a new arrayList called toys. Initializes a new instance of AppMenu called appMenu. Calls loadData() to load data from toys.txt into the toys arrayList. Catches any errors if user inputs a negative price for toy price using a custom exception class.

  • Method Details

    • launchApplication

      private void launchApplication() throws NegativeInputPrice
      Initializes application by calling showMainMenu from appMenu. Goes into search function, add new toy, remove toy or save and exit depending on user input.
      Throws:
      NegativeInputPrice

    • Search

      private void Search()
      If user enters 1 at the main menu, the SubMenu is called from appMenu. Can search based on serialNum, toyName, or toyType, depending on user input. If user enters 4, program exits back to the main menu.

    • Save

      private void Save()
      Prints new data into the toys.txt file using the format method. Toy subclasses overload format method depending on toy type.

    • searchByType

      private void searchByType(String toyType)
      takes in users input and searches for the toy
      Parameters:
      toyType -

    • searchByToyName

      private void searchByToyName(String toyName)
      takes in userinput and look up the toy the user asks for
      Parameters:
      toyName -

    • searchBySerialNum

      private void searchBySerialNum(String serialNum)
      takes ina serial number the user input and find toy that matches the serial number
      Parameters:
      serialNum -

    • removeToy

      private void removeToy(String serialNum)
      takes in serial number from user find the serial number that matches and asks the user if they want to remove the toy
      Parameters:
      serialNum -

    • addNewToy

      private void addNewToy(String serialNum, String toyName, String toyBrand, float toyPrice, int availableCount, int minimumAge) throws Exception
      takes in serial number, toy name, brand, price, available count, and age then it formats and create a new two
      Parameters:
      serialNum -
      toyName -
      toyBrand -
      toyPrice -
      availableCount -
      minimumAge -
      Throws:
      Exception

    • loadData

      private void loadData()
      Uses a scanner and while loop to load data from toys.txt file into the toys array. Depending on the first number of the serial number, different types of toys are created by splitting data.
